subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Blackhawks thought they had tied the game in the third period, but a goal by Andrew Shaw was waved off because he was in the crease, and Detroit scored again to seal the win.
snippet: The Blackhawks thought they had tied the game in the third period, but a goal by Andrew Shaw was waved off because he was in the crease, and Detroit scored again to seal the win.
